spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout does not match the 3BHK 2D plan. The 2D plan is a long, linear unit with central Living & Dining, three bedrooms (Master on far left, Bedroom-1 upper left of living, Bedroom-2 far right), multiple toilets, two balconies, kitchen + utility on the right, and wide passages. The 3D render depicts a much smaller, compact layout with only one clearly readable bedroom, a combined living area, and a kitchen/dining zone; the linear sequencing and room positions are not preserved. Door and window positions are largely inconsistent with the plan, and room proportions/elongation are significantly distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major program elements from the plan are missing (2 bedrooms, multiple toilets, utility, balconies, passages), and adjacency relationships (e.g., bedroom-toilet attachments, living-to-balcony, kitchen-to-utility) are not maintained. Several interior partitions in the 3D model do not correspond to any walls in the 2D plan, indicating hallucinated structure. Wall/door integration appears plausible as a standalone model, but it does not faithfully embed doors/walls per the source plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not correspond to the specific 3BHK plan’s room set and likely room functions (e.g., missing multiple bedroom setups and dining configuration for the central living/dining as drawn). Several furniture groupings (desk/office-like setup) appear invented relative to the plan. Scale is generally consistent internally, but mapping to the 2D layout is largely incorrect.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is clear and generally well-composed, with acceptable lighting and readable geometry. However, it is not an accurate architectural isometric translation of the 2D plan (projection/orthographic faithfulness is poor relative to the source). Some simplification/blockiness is present but not severely artifacted.

detected_errors.description: Missing Bedroom-2 (far right in 2D plan) in the 3D render.
Missing Bedroom-1 (upper-left of Living & Dining in 2D plan) in the 3D render.
Missing Master Bedroom + its balcony (far left in 2D plan) in the 3D render.
Missing central Living & Dining balcony (top center in 2D plan) in the 3D render.
Missing Utility adjacent to Kitchen (right side in 2D plan) in the 3D render.
Missing multiple toilets shown in 2D plan (including attached/common/powder) or not represented in correct count/locations in the 3D render.
Kitchen area is not placed/configured per the right-side kitchen + utility arrangement shown in the 2D plan.
Living & Dining is not centrally positioned with the same surrounding adjacencies (bedrooms/toilets/balcony) as in the 2D plan.
Doors are not placed/oriented according to the 2D plan’s entry, bedroom doors, toilet doors, and passage doors.
Windows are not placed to match the 2D plan’s exterior openings along the long perimeter and at balconies.
Overall unit proportions are heavily distorted: the 2D plan is long and linear; the 3D render is compact and does not preserve length-to-width ratios.
Hallucinated interior partitions/room subdivisions appear in the 3D render that do not correspond to walls in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated furniture program (e.g., office/desk-like setup) not indicated by the 2D plan and inconsistent with missing rooms.
